feed.title: Appwrite Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Notable changes

  • Remove JPEG fallback for webp by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8746
  • Add new runtimes by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8771
  • Remove audits deletion by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8766
  • Bump assistant by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8801
  • Change max queries values to 500 by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8802
  • Allow '.wav' as 'audio/x-wav' as well by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8846
  • Use 1 instead of 0.5 cpu for default function specification by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8848
  • Update function runtimes by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8781
  • Add a realtime heartbeat by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8943
  • Bump console to version 5.2.27 by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9034

Fixes

  • Trigger functions event only if event is not paused by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8526
  • Update docker-compose to restart usage-dump by @feschaffa in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8642
  • Fix typo in scheduler base by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8691
  • Add domain and force HTTPS env vars to mail worker by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8722
  • Fix webp by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8732
  • Ignore junction tables by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8728
  • Fix logger throwing fatal error by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8724
  • Fix missing protocol for testing SMTP by @byawitz in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8749
  • Make create execution async loose by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8707
  • Fix invalid cursor value by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8109
  • Fix target deletes by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8833
  • Fix translation commas by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8892
  • Fix Migrations having source creds being overwritten and add Migration tests by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8897
  • Fix validator usage for updating string size by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8890
  • Fix create user event not triggering by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8718
  • Improve error handling and logging in the database worker by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8944
  • Remove inaccurate info about leaving the URL parameter empty by @ebenezerdon in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8963
  • Ensure indexes are updated when updating an attribute key by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8971
  • Remove duplicate dart-2.16 runtime template by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8972
  • Fix team invites with existing session by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9006
  • Improve handling of HTTP requests by dispatching to safe workers by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9016
  • Fix users create session secret by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9019
  • Fix swoole task warning by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9025
  • Update project last activity on init by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9002

Miscellaneous

  • Update Init copy by @adityaoberai in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8557
  • Fix security scan permissions and comment by @EVDOG4LIFE in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8525
  • Add Trivy security scans by @btme0011 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/6876
  • Update database stack by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8564
  • Bump database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8573
  • Sync main with 1.5.x by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8589
  • Add AWS to one-click installs by @byawitz in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8593
  • Update Init copy in readme by @adityaoberai in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8618
  • Sync main into 1.6.x by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8685
  • Sync 1.6.x into main by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8686
  • Feat coroutines by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/7826
  • Sync main into 1.6.x by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8719
  • Sentence casing endpoint API reference by @choir241 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8617
  • DB storage metrics by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8404
  • Fix exception thrown when optional array attribute does not exist by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8391
  • Add projects channels to realtime by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8735
  • Base for console roles support by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8565
  • Remove DB disk storage calculation by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8745
  • Messaging adapter default values by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8742
  • Add payload response type by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8720
  • Fix flaky functions tests by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8682
  • Migrations Backups by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8186
  • Add test for response and request filters by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8697
  • Bump version in SECURITY.md by @EVDOG4LIFE in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8755
  • Add originalId attribute to databases collection by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8764
  • Fix Walter References by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8757
  • Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8769
  • Move new attributes by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8777
  • Add ping endpoint by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8761
  • Fix GitHub action caching by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8772
  • Chore release ruby SDK by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8767
  • Call migration success on success by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8782
  • Update utopia-php/system to 0.9.0 by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8780
  • Move createDocument from api to worker by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8776
  • Add missing indexes by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8803
  • Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8809
  • Fix typo in BLR region by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8756
  • Add tests for project variables by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8815
  • Replace 'Expires' with 'Cache-Control: private' header to avoid CDN caching by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8836
  • Allow blocking based on resource attributes by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8812
  • Check if resource is blocked inside functions worker by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8855
  • Fix missing allow attribute by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8889
  • Revert function execution order by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8857
  • Use resource type constants by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8895
  • Update Database lib by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8680
  • Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8917
  • Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8923
  • Update database for transaction counter fixes with retries by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8927
  • Validate string permissions by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8929
  • Add PubSub adapter support by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8905
  • List memberships as client by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8913
  • Fix XDebug Extension not being removed by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8891
  • Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8946
  • Use utopia compression by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8938
  • Make compression minimum size configurable by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8947
  • Revert "Update database" by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8949
  • Fix setpaused by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8948
  • Use getDocument instead of find() for rules by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8951
  • Remove double fetch from migrations worker by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8956
  • Fix memberships privacy MFA by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8969
  • Add telemetry by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8960
  • Send migration errors individually by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8959
  • Add console sdk previews by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8990
  • Unset index length by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8978
  • Update base to 0.9.5 by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9005
  • Sync main into 1.6.x by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9011
  • Improved shared tables V2 by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9013
  • Ensure backwards compatibility for 1.6.x by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9018
  • Add more tags to logging by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9028
  • Preview domains locally by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8932

New Contributors

  • @feschaffa made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8642
  • @basert made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8780
  • @ebenezerdon made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8963

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.6.0...1.6.1

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Notable changes

  • Delete git folder to reduce build size by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9076
  • Upgrade assistant by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9100
  • Use redis adapter for abuse by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9121
  • Set base specification CPUs to 0.5 again by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9146
  • Add new push message parameters by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9060
  • Update audits to include user type by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9211
  • Enable HEIC by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9251
  • Added teamName to membership redirect url by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9269
  • Add support endpoint url for S3 by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9303
  • Added RuPay Credit Card Icon in Avatars Service by @Yavnik in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/5046
  • Add figma oauth provider by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9623
  • Update console to version 5.2.58 by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9637

Fixes

  • Remove failed attribute by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9032
  • Fix delete notFound attribute by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9038
  • 🇮🇸 Added missing Icelandic translations for email strings. by @olitomas in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/4848
  • fix doc comment for filter method by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/5769
  • Delete attribute No throwing Exception on not found by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9157
  • Fix VCS identity collision by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9138
  • Fix disabling of email-otp when user wants to by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9200
  • Ensure user can delete session by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9209
  • Fix resend invitation by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9218
  • Fix phone number parsing exception handling by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9246
  • Fix amazon oauth by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9253
  • Fix slack oauth scopes, and updated to v2 by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9228
  • Fix forwarded user agent by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9271
  • Fix WEBP File Preview Rendering Issue by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9321
  • Fix build memory specifications by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9360
  • Fix Self Hosting functions by adding missed config by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9373
  • Fix resend team invite if already accepted by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9348
  • Fix null errors on team invite by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9391
  • Fix email (smtp) to multiple recipients by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9243
  • Fix stats timing by using receivedAt date when available by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9428
  • Make min/max params optional for attribute update by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9387
  • Fix blocking of phone sessions when disabled on console by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9447
  • Fix logging config by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9467
  • Update audit timestamp origin by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9481
  • Fix certificates in deletes worker by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9466
  • Fix console audits delete by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9547
  • Fix migrations by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9633
  • Ensure all 4xx errors in OAuth redirect lead to the failure URL by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9679
  • Treat 0 as unlimited for CPUs and memory by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9638
  • Add contextual dispatch logic to fix high CPU usage by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9687
### Miscellaneous * Merge 1.6.x into feat-custom-cf-hostnames by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8904 * Improve compression param checks by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8922 * upgrade utopia storage by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8930 * Feat migration by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8797 * feat fix web routes by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8962 * Fix no pool access by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9027 * feat: use environment variable to check rules format by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9039 * Update storage.php by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9037 * Upgrade db 0.53.200 by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9050 * Chore: upgrade utopia storage by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9066 * Update usage-dump payload by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9085 * GitHub Workflows security hardening by @sashashura in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/3728 * Update add-oauth2-provider.md by @tusharxoxoxo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/4313 * update readme-cn some doc by @gofenix in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/5278 * Add accessibility features by @mishmanners in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/7042 * Add Appwrite Cloud to read me. by @gewenyu99 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/5445 * Migration throw error by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9092 * Fix usage payload bug by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9097 * chore: replace occurrences of dbForConsole to dbForPlatform by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9096 * fix(realtime): decrement connectionCounter only if connection is known by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9055 * payload bug fix by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9098 * Fix usage payload bug by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9099 * Usage payload debug by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9101 * Usage payload debug by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9103 * Usage payload debug by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9104 * Feat: createFunction abuse labels by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9102 * Docs-create-document by @gewenyu99 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9105 * Docs: Create document and unknown attribute error messages. by @gewenyu99 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/5427 * Fix: update project accessed at from router and schedulers by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9109 * chore: initial commit by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9111 * chore: optimise webhooks payload by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9115 * Revert "chore: initial commit" by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9117 * chore: fix attribute name by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9118 * Migrate to redis abuse by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9124 * Added webhooks usage stats by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9125 * chore remove abuse cleanup by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9137 * fix: remove abuse delete trigger by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9139 * Remove firebase OAuth API endpoints by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9144 * chore: release client sdks by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9112 * Update general.php by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9155 * feat(swoole): allow configuration override of available cpus by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9177 * Usage databases api read writes addition by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9142 * Fix dead connections by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9190 * Add hostname to audits by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9165 * chore: shifted authphone usage tracking to api calls by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9191 * Revert "Fix dead connections" by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9201 * Add assertEventually to messaging provider logs test by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9192 * feat project sms usage by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9198 * chore: add audit labels to project resources by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9056 * fix sms usage by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9207 * Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9202 * Fix dead connections by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9213 * Revert "Fix dead connections" by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9214 * Add logs db init for consistency by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9163 * Split the collection definitions by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9153 * Log path with populated parameters by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9220 * Add missing scope on function template by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9208 * Add relatedCollection default by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9225 * fix: function usage by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9235 * feat: optimise events payloads by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9232 * Optimise webhook events by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9168 * fix: maintenance job missing type by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9238 * Update Fetch to 0.3.0 by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9245 * Fix maintenance job by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9247 * chore: add missing case for executions by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9248 * Add index dependency exception by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9226 * chore: fix benchmarking test when made from fork by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9233 * Update SDK Generator versions by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9188 * chore: skipped job instead of throwing error by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9250 * Implement new SDK Class on 1.6.x by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9237 * Delete collection before Appwrite's attributes by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9256 * Feat batch usage dump by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9255 * Fix cloud tests by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9261 * Usage: Databases reads writes by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9260 * Update: Latest sdk specs by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9274 * Revert "Feat batch usage dump" by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9276 * feat: add fast2SMS adapter by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9263 * Update Sdk Generator dependency by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9280 * Transformed at addition by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9281 * Docs: clarify update endpoints only work on draft messages by @ebenezerdon in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9236 * Update sdk generator dependency by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9282 * Revert "Transformed at addition" by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9284 * replaced init for cloud link by @LauraDuRy in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9285 * Add transformed at by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9289 * Make migrations use Dynamic keys for destination by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9291 * Make sessions limit tests assert eventually by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9298 * Chore update database by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9306 * feat: add AMQP queues by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9287 * fix(test): use assertEventually instead of while(true) by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9308 * fix(certificate worker): events are published without queue name by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9309 * chore: update utopia-php/queue to 0.8.1 by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9311 * chore: update utopia-php/queue to 0.8.2 by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9312 * fix(schedule-tasks): revert back to direct pool usage by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9313 * feat: custom app schemes by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9262 * Revert "feat: custom app schemes" by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9319 * Restore "feat: custom app schemes"" by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9320 * Revert "Restore "feat: custom app schemes""" by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9323 * chore: update dependencies by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9330 * Feat: logs DB by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9272 * Catch invalid index by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9329 * Fix: missing call for image transformations counting by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9342 * Fix drop abuse on shared table project delete by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9346 * Only run all table mode tests on db update by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9338 * Fix: missing periodic metric by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9350 * feat(builds): check if function is blocked before building by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9332 * feat: batch create audit logs by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9347 * Chore: Update migrations by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9355 * Fix: metric time was not being written to DB by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9354 * Fix patch index validation by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9356 * Fix image trnasformation metrics by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9370 * Use batch delete in worker by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9375 * Fix Model Platform is missing response key: store by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9361 * Feat key segmented usage by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9336 * Feat messaging metrics by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9353 * Fix removed audits for shared v2 by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9388 * chore: bump utopia-php/image to 0.8.0 by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9390 * Fix outdated CLI commands in documentation by @gurjeetsinghvirdee in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9122 * disable logs display by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9398 * Log batches per project by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9403 * Batch per project by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9410 * Fix: stats resources only queue projects accessed in last 3 hours by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9411 * Track options requests by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9397 * chore: bump docker-base by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9406 * refactor: migrate Realtime::send calls to queueForRealtime by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9325 * Revert "Fix: stats resources only queue projects accessed in last 3 hours" by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9424 * Remove usage and usage dump in favor of stats-usage and stats-usage-dump by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9339 * Fix: disable dual writing by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9429 * Disable transformedAt update for console users by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9425 * chore: add image transformation stats to usage endpoint by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9393 * chore: added timeout to deployment builds in tests by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9426 * fix: model for image transformations in usage project by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9442 * Feat: calculate database storage in stats-resources by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9443 * Activities batch writes by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9438 * chore: bump cache 0.12.x by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9412 * chore: queue console project for maintenance delete by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9479 * chore: added logsdb for deletes worker by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9462 * Feat: calculate and log time taken for each project by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9491 * chore: update initializing dbForLogs by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9494 * Feat bulk audit delete by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9487 * Prepare 1.6.2 release by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9499 * Regenerate specs by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9497 * Regenerate examples by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9498 * chore: bump sdk by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9414 * update queue to 0.9.* by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9505 * Feat improve delete queries by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9507 * Feat: Add rule attributes by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9508 * Sync main into 1.6.x by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9496 * Bump console to version 5.2.53 by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9495 * Prepare 1.6.1 release by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9294 * Improve delete ordering by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9512 * Cleanups by @eldadfux in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9511 * Feat dynamic regions by @eldadfux in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9408 * Feat env vars to system lib by @eldadfux in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9515 * Feat: domains count by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9514 * Migration read from db by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9529 * feat: add pool telemetry by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9530 * Disable PDO persistence since we manage our own pool by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9526 * chore: set min operations to 1 for reads and writes by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9536 * Remove default region by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9430 * Use cursor pagination with bigger limit for maintenance project loop by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9546 * chore: stop tests on failure by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9525 * chore: only update total count for privileged users by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9554 * refactor: initialization of audit retention by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9563 * Delete worker queries fixes by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9523 * Bump database 0.62.x by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9568 * Fix: schedules region filtering by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9577 * Deletes worker fix selects for pagination by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9578 * Add $permissions for delete documents selects by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9579 * chore(audits): return queue pre-fetch results by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9533 * Revert "chore(audits): return queue pre-fetch results" by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9586 * Feat multi tenant insert by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9573 * Add order by for cursor by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9588 * Feat update fetch by @eldadfux in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9592 * Fix tenant casting by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9598 * Feat update ws by @eldadfux in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9602 * Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9603 * Fix: image transformation cache by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9608 * Remove audit payload by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9610 * Sample rate from DSN by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9559 * Restrict role change for sole org owner by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9615 * chore: update php image to 0.8.1 by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9616 * feat: refactor executor setup by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9420 * chore: update gitpod.yml config by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9561 * chore: update dependencies by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9625 * Update migrations lib by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9628 * feat: cache telemetry by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9624 * Bump console to version 5.2.56 by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9631 * Multi region support by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8667 * Revert "Multi region support" by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9632 * Revert "Revert "Multi region support"" by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9636 * Fix tasks by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9644 * chore: updated the migration version to 8.6 by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9646 * Fix: merge the working of StatsUsage and StatsUsageDump by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9585 * Update database by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9643 * chore: fix error logging for CLI tasks by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9651 * fix: usage test assertion by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9653 * Fix keys by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9656 * Feat: multi tenant dual writing by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9583 * Fix/throwing 400 for null order attributes by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9657 * feat: sdk group attribute by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9596 * Add configurable function and build size by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9648 * feat: update API endpoint in the code examples by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8933 * chore: abstract token secret hiding to response model by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9574 * chore: update sdks by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9655 * feat: allow non-critical events to ignore exceptions when enqueuing the event by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9680 * Revert "Add configurable function and build size" by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9681 * core: introduce endpoint.docs in specs by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9685 * fix: remove content-type header from get request specs by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9666 * chore: update flutter sdk by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9691

[!IMPORTANT] Please run the migrate command even if upgrading from 1.6.x.

New Contributors

  • @sashashura made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/3728
  • @Yavnik made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/5046
  • @olitomas made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/4848
  • @gofenix made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/5278
  • @gurjeetsinghvirdee made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9122
  • @ArnabChatterjee20k made their first contribution in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9646

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.6.1...1.6.2

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add new collection by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8832
  • Move functions endpoints to modules by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8839
  • Fix workers by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8842
  • fix: builds worker new structure by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8843
  • feat: static runtime by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8849
  • Add secret attribute to variables by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8831
  • fix: commands and todos by @TorstenDittmann in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8852
  • Add new endpoints in HTTP structure by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8844
  • Feat: Static sites by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8860
  • Add custom domain param in create site endpoint by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8865
  • Add timeout and add sites scopes by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8863
  • Fix: leftover structure by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8872
  • Use compute vars for functions and sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8873
  • Add build and serve runtime to updateSite by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8875
  • Feat: Implement preview deployments by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8877
  • Fix: unwanted notice by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8878
  • Throw exception for error by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8879
  • Fix: deployment domain incorrect by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8880
  • Fix: sites deployment logs realtime by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8882
  • Feat: Styled&timestamped logs by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8883
  • Fix: sites get template missing key by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8884
  • Feat add sites comments by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8885
  • Create preview url rule when deployment is created by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9001
  • Add _APP_DOMAIN_SITES to console variables by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9010
  • Add fallbackFile for SPA by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8995
  • Change case to sentence case for site template titles by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9030
  • Logs for sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9047
  • Feat: Server-side rendering for site frameworks by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9033
  • Feat bulk deletes by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8942
  • Feat bulk updates by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8955
  • Feat: Bulk Create Documents by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8968
  • Feat new sdk label by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9108
  • Feat create documents sdk by @PineappleIOnic in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9086
  • Delete rules when site or deployment is deleted by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8939
  • Fix: Sites manual QA by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9193
  • Add tests for sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9182
  • Chore: Deprecate markdown docs refferences by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9307
  • Chore: Improve tsts by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9324
  • Add secret param to update variable endpoint by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9322
  • Add new console endpoint to check resource availability by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8970
  • Feat: preview branding by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9326
  • Fix: Site CORS by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9359
  • Feat: Template deployments by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9364
  • Move rule creation to create rule by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9352
  • Add createVcsDeployment endpoints for sites and functions by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9380
  • Fix: Improve tests OPR setup by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9382
  • Feat: Site screenshots by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9366
  • Chore: Remove subquery by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9405
  • Feat: Enhance rules by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9395
  • Fix: deviceForSites by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9407
  • Feat: SPA support by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9314
  • Move function endpoints from controller to modules by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9416
  • Feat: Build download endpoint in Functions by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9419
  • Chore: Add SSR logs test by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9421
  • Feat: Screenshot task for templates by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9417
  • Chore: Combine download endpoints by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9434
  • Add resource type label in sites endpoints by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9432
  • Chore: Rename deployment activate endpoint by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9436
  • Chore: Migrate redeploy endpoint by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9445
  • Chore: Move cancel build to update deployment status by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9455
  • Feat: Reuse Node runtime by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9463
  • Feat: Merge specs by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9469
  • Chore Remove builds collection by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9457
  • Feat: Authorized previews by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9357
  • Integrate detection library with Appwrite by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9315
  • Chore: 2nd rules rehaul by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9461
  • Fix: site tests by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9474
  • Truncate commit message to 252 characters by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9433
  • Add get and list template tests for sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9483
  • Feat: OPR v5 by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9485
  • Chore: Attribute name consistency by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9484
  • Avoid code repetition in workers and tasks by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9490
  • Throw build error for adapter mismatch by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9492
  • Improve params readability by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9500
  • Fix github comment by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9504
  • Fix: Realtime events in build worker by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9519
  • Fix: Response model for framework (adapters) by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9522
  • Feat: totalSize attribute by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9524
  • Feat: Add screenshots to site by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9532
  • Fix incorrect URL for git commits by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9535
  • Feat: Active deployment details - status, creation date by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9534
  • Feat: Latest deployment details by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9537
  • Re-enable test by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9550
  • Split params across multiple lines where overflowing by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9551
  • Fix GitHub check URL by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9549
  • Add fallbackfile and adapter to deployments collection by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9570
  • Add logging param to sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9576
  • Feat: Bash support by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9575
  • If build has failed, show correct error page by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9569
  • Fix: Deployment status by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9580
  • Feat fix 308 redirect by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9553
  • feat: add query by role to memberships by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9503
  • Feat: A/AAA record support by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9627
  • Chore add test for empty source by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9542
  • Add tests for empty output directory by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9566
  • Fix: usage stats changes by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9597
  • Design nice looking error pages by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9606
  • Feat: CSV Import by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9622
  • Fix deployment and executions deletion by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9660
  • Add resourceId by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9662
  • Feat sites by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8859
  • Update: specs by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9663
  • Allow compressed CSV by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9673
  • Development Keys by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8378
  • Feat: tokens by @lohanidamodar in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/8997
  • Feat add favicon to error pages by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9672
  • Chore separate benchmark in ci/cd by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9664
  • Feat: Add playground templates by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9676
  • Chore: updated utopia migration version by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9677
  • feat(users): synchronously delete identities and targets in controller by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9689
  • Chore: Database migration preparations by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9698
  • Move specification into SDK namespace by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9478
  • Feat pool adapter by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9659
  • Revert "Feat pool adapter" by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9703
  • Add: Source report method by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9709
  • Expose var by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9710

  • tasks: clean all Timers on error & shutdown by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9727
  • Fix: FileTokens by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9678
  • chore: add harden create email token endpoint by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9724
  • chore: update utopia database to 0.67.x by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9729
  • refactor: maintenance task to run at a specific time by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9734

  • chore: introduce class attribute to oauth2 config by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9737
  • Fix request filters with multi-method routes by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9743
  • feat(scheduling): add telemetry for scheduler tasks by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9721
  • fix(schedules): enqueue delay telemetry in wrong format by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9749
  • fix(schedules): better error handling by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9751
  • Fix indexes for 1.7.x by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9752
  • Feat/index length by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9748
  • fix(schedules): disable coroutine until we have proper pool support by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9759
  • feat: inforu adapter by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9620
  • Fix databases usage metrics by @shimonewman in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9760
  • chore: improve route not found error message by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9733

  • feat: plan based email logoUrl by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9745
  • Update tokens without JWT by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9750
  • Swap default image quality to -1, keeping source image quality. by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9766
  • feat: add ability to generate client and server sdks by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9747
  • Fix owner role downgrade by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9765
  • Fix infinie loop in delete project by @fogelito in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9726
  • Only rethrow auth and timeout in general handler by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9767
  • Fix scopes by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9768

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: request response formats for 1.7.x by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9801
  • Fix: domain validaiton by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9802
  • Fix: backwards compatibility for function creation by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9804
  • Fix: site env vars at runtime by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9805
  • Feat: bypass gateway by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9806
  • Chore: update domains by @christyjacob4 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9808
  • Fix: logic of chunk reading by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9810

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.7.0...1.7.1

entry.title: New release for Appwrite: 1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove: search to maintain document structure by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9812
  • Chore: upgrade detection, executor and console by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9816
  • fix: task coroutine hooks by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9814
  • fix: task coroutine hooks by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9815
  • fix: add _APP_DOMAIN_SITES variables.php so the env is initialized by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9825
  • certificates: add domainType to certificate worker by @basert in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9828
  • Feat pool adapter by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9757
  • Fix: flutter starter by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9830
  • fix: download endpoint by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9831
  • Update: token desc by @ItzNotABug in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9820
  • Chore: Upgrade console by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9833
  • Feat: Add lynx gallery by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9835
  • Catch query exception on get document for selects by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9834
  • Upsert single document route by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9811
  • Fix migrating functions with no deployments by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9829
  • Merge 1.7.x into main by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9840
  • Merge pull request #9811 from ArnabChatterjee20k/upsert-single-docume… by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9843
  • feat: add dev key to clients by @loks0n in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9837
  • Append build error to build logs by @vermakhushboo in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9836
  • Append build error to build logs by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9844
  • Prepare 1.7.2 release by @stnguyen90 in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9826
  • added checking for encrypt and plan allowing encryption of string att… by @ArnabChatterjee20k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9841
  • Sync 1.7.x by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9846
  • Sync 1.6.x by @abnegate in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9845
  • fix: allow devkeys header to pass CORS by @ChiragAgg5k in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9848
  • Fix: double logs on failure by @Meldiron in https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/pull/9852

Full Changelog: https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/compare/1.7.1...1.7.2
